item.title: Ukraine calls for Trump-Zelensky meeting in US this week
item.description: Meanwhile, the US has confirmed its officials are set to meet Russian representatives in Abu Dhabi

item.title: Graham Linehan cleared of harassing trans activist but guilty of damaging phone
item.description: Comedy writer Graham Linehan "deliberately whacked" a teenage trans woman's phone out of her hand, a court heard.

item.title: Heathrow's Â£49bn plan for longer third runway chosen by government
item.description: Under the selected plan, the runway would be up to 3.5km long and require a new road tunnel under the airport.

item.title: UK government urged to step up efforts to return couple jailed in Iran
item.description: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe's husband told the BBC the UK government should have learned lessons from his wife's detention.

item.title: Slight improvement in water quality at bathing sites, new figures show
item.description: The annual figures from the Environment Agency show 93% of sites met minimum standards, up from 92% last year.
